alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Richland; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 12:54PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Daniels, Roosevelt, southern Sheridan, northeastern McCone and Richland Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 1253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vida, or 17 miles southeast of Wolf Point, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Wolf Point, Poplar, Culbertson, Fairview, Brockton, Medicine Lake, Bainville, Froid, Lambert, Bredette, Vida, Snowden, Fort Kipp, Dagmar, Homestead, Enid, Volt, Nohly and Wooley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
